There is a multitude of packages with Abu Dhabi Safari rates available to tour the amazing deserts of the emirates, more specifically of Abu Dhabi and explore. The means of transport can be chosen, be it a vehicle or a camel, provided that you have the stamina and adventurous enough bone in you. Quad bike tours and buggy tours are also available. The rates for children only apply for those that are between the ages of 4 to 12. Below that age they are under the responsibility of the parents and if they arenâ€™t requiring a seat then basically there is no charge for them. Any cancellation of the safari bookings have to be made before 6 hours prior to the safari otherwise refunds will not be made. The cost for the Abu Dhabi Safari Rates mentioned below is all in the currency Arab Emirates Dirham (AED). An evening safari with 90 minutes of dune bashing on a private car would generally cost somewhere around 1600 to 1900 AED, varying for about one to six people. This is normally available from 2 o clock in the afternoon till 9 o clock at night. The morning dune bashing is offered from between 8 o clock in the morning till 12 o clock in the afternoon, for about 1100 to 1400 AED. An overnight stay in the desert from 3 o clock in the afternoon till 9 o clock the next morning would comprise of a 1000 AED cost for a private car and only an additional 200 AED per person. Dinner without dune bashing is available between 4 o clock in the afternoon till 9 o clock at night for about 800 to 1200 AED generally for one to six people. There are even some special packages for evening desert safaris starting from about 500 AED which are inclusive of dune bashing, shisha, belly dancing, henna painting, dinner under the stars Arabic costumes, camel riding, sand boarding, watching the sunset in the desert, refreshments, all this which would normally cost 250 AED per person, plus an Abu Dhabi dhow cruise which would have fully air conditioned lower decks and open air upper decks with fire safety mechanism, life jackets and other safety precautions. There will be a scrumptious buffet dinner on deck. This is all for you to take in the breathtaking views and have a wonderful time aboard which can be cherished to the fullest. Liwa full day desert tour is also available but the package structure is subject to change so bookings and costs are to be disclosed upon contact. Abu Dhabi has both sand and water quite abundantly so skiing is also a major tourist attraction here. A standard snow board is what is required for sand skiing in the Abu Dhabi desert. Sand skiing championships are also organized here and only add to the overall thrill of the experience. It must however be remembered that sunglasses, appropriate clothing and sunscreen is important to remember for protection from the strong sunlight.
